name: CreateIncidentType
description:
Create a new incident type in PagerDuty to categorize incidents.

Use this tool to create a new incident type in PagerDuty, allowing categorization by type, such as security incidents, major incidents, or fraud incidents. This helps organize and respond to different kinds of incidents effectively.

parameters.name: versioning_header
parameters.description: The string value for the `Accept` header to specify API versioning.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specify the content type for the request. Must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: incident_type_details
parameters.description: Details of the incident type to be created, including name, display name, parent type, enabled status, and description.

name.description: The name of the Incident Type. Usage of the suffix `_default` is prohibited. This cannot be changed once the incident type has been created.

display_name.description: The display name of the Incident Type. Usage of the prefix `PD`, `PagerDuty`, `Default` is prohibited.

parent_type.description: The parent type of the Incident Type. Either name or id of the parent type can be used.

enabled.description: Whether the Incident Type is enabled. Defaults to true if not provided.

description.description: The description of the Incident Type.

incident_type.description: Details of the incident type to be created.
